description:
## Model Family Registration

Register a model family - a group of models sharing code bases.

Model families help establish model genealogies for inter-model comparisons.

See [Masson and Knutti (2011)](https://doi.org/10.1029/2011GL046864) for examples.

label: Family Name
description: The family name.\n\nOften persists across model versions and may be the first part of full model names.

label: Description
description: Description of the model family.\n\nInclude scientific focus and common characteristics shared by family members.
placeholder: Describe the model family, its scientific focus, and common characteristics...

label: Primary Institution
description: The primary institution responsible for the model family.

label: Collaborative Institutions
description: Other institutions that collaborate on this model family.\n\nLeave empty if none.

label: Scientific Domains
description: The scientific domains covered by this family.

label: Year Established
description: Year the model family was established.\n\nLeave blank if unknown.

label: Representative Member
description: Name of a representative model from this family.

label: Website URL
description: Official website for the model family.\n\nLeave blank if none.

label: References
description:
Key publications describing the model family.

Format:
citation: [Full citation text]
doi: https://doi.org/[DOI]
placeholder: citation: Smith, A. et al. (2024). Family overview.\ndoi: https://doi.org/10.1234/example

label: Issue Kind
description: Select whether this is a new submission or modification of existing entry.
